tool.name: Contamination Filter (confil)
tool.help:
Usage: confil [OPTIONS] SEQFILES...
Options: --db PATH Name for Kraken 2 DB [default: /tools/databases/kraken2/04092018/standard/; required] --threads INTEGER Number of threads [default: 1] --cutoff INTEGER Percentage of fragments covered [default: 90] --paired The filenames provided have paired-end reads --help Show this message and exit.
